column1: The same sentence was pronounced separately in respect of both Accused.
8.  Aggrieved  by  the  afore-stated  conviction  and  the  order  of  sentence,  the  convicted
Accused  presented  an  Appeal  to  the  High  Court  of  the  Provinces  holden  in  Galle.
During  the  appellate  hearing,  the  Accused  -  Appellants  canvassed  the  alleged
unlawfulness  of  both  their  convictions  for  the  offence  of  forgery  and  the  order  of
sentence imposed by the learned Magistrate. Following argument, by his judgment
dated  1st  November  2012,  the  learned  Judge  of  the  High  Court  of  the  Provinces
affirmed  the  conviction  and  the  order  of  sentence,  and  accordingly  dismissed  the
